title: Temporal Pulse
subtitle: Contracts in {{year}} — rhythms, spikes, and political cycles

adminScorecard.title: Administration Comparison
adminScorecard.description: Click any administration to view contracts from that era.

monthlyRhythm.title: Monthly Procurement Rhythm ({{year}})
monthlyRhythm.description: Contract volume by month with risk overlay. December bars highlighted when they exceed the annual average. Click any bar to investigate contracts from that period — December bars show year-end contracts specifically.

decemberAnalysis.title: December Spike Analysis (2018-2024)
decemberAnalysis.description: December contract counts vs average of other months. Years where December exceeds 1.5x are highlighted. Budget-clearing behavior drives predictable year-end surges.

adminBands.title: Procurement by Presidential Administration
adminBands.description: Year-over-year contract volume with administration periods shaded. Highlighted years (red dashed lines) show anomalous spikes in high-risk contracts. Click any bar to investigate contracts from that year.

politicalTimeline.title: Political Events Timeline
politicalTimeline.description: Key political events that may have influenced procurement patterns. Elections, reforms, scandals, and crises can all trigger shifts in spending behavior. Click any event to investigate contracts from that year.
